Class AddItemFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
com.example.homeheirs.AddItemFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, Scanner.OnScanActivityListener
public class AddItemFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment implements Scanner.OnScanActivityListener
A DialogFragment for adding or editing items in the item list. Provides a form for the user to input details of an item, including name, purchase date, description, make, model, serial number, estimated value, and additional comments.

    • validate

      public boolean validate(String name, String month, String day, String year, String make, String model, String value)
      Validates the input the EditText fields for creating or editing an item
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      month - The purchase month of the item.
      day - The purchase day of the item.
      year - The purchase year of the item.
      make - The make of the item.
      model - The model of the item.
      value - The estimated value of the item.
      Returns:
      True if all input fields are valid; otherwise, false. Error messages are displayed for each invalid field.
